summary: The 'Do or Dye Act' aims to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act by deeming certain color additives unsafe for use in food. Specifically, the bill targets specified color additives (Red No. 40, Yellow No. 5, etc.) and any substantially similar additives, declaring food containing them adulterated by December 31, 2026. The bill also impacts 'qualified color additives' like Citrus Red No. 2 and Orange B.
